verbLexeme: 1. To have an official document which gives you permission to do, use, or own something. English = (be) licensed.
nominalLexeme: 1. An official document which gives you permission to do, use, or own something. English = licence, permit.
2. A official document which gives you permission to drive a car. English = driver's licence.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: the outline of a licence.
